title: Common definitions for  Harmonized Data Models adapted to Hl7 data models

anyOf.description: Property. Identifier format of any NGSI entity
Property. Identifier format of any NGSI entity

EntityIdentifierType.description: Property. Unique identifier of the entity

dateCreated.description: Property. Entity creation timestamp. This will usually be allocated by the storage platform

dateModified.description: Property. Timestamp of the last modification of the entity. This will usually be allocated by the storage platform

source.description: Property. A sequence of characters giving the original source of the entity data as a URL. Recommended to be the fully qualified domain name of the source provider, or the URL to the source object

name.description: Property. The name of this item

alternateName.description: Property. An alternative name for this item

description.description: Property. A description of this item

dataProvider.description: Property. A sequence of characters identifying the provider of the harmonised data entity

seeAlso.description: Property. list of uri pointing to additional resources about the item
